message: Corrected link
Clarified representation of color bit depth to include reference to float-based systems.
Added a section dealing specifically with color balance in film and video
added timing to reference
Add external link
Added an animated visualization of a black body heating up
Added a link to a moviola.com video which covers fluid heads in detail, along with other tripod information. Also added a video depicting a tripod head being mounted to a hi hat.

Added citations to article. First the page references to Flags in the "Set Lighting Technician's Handbook, third edition". Second, the relevant section on Flags in the free video-based training course on moviola.com.
Added reference to Floppies.
Added attribution link

Add information on single and double scrims. Added a source website (moviola.com), with a link directly to the instructional video on scrims. Strangely none of the major written references on lighting (e.g. the Set Lighting Technicians Handbook, or Blaine Brown's Motion Picture and Video Lighting) had any detailed information on scrims. Also added video depicting scrims, an excerpt from the moviola.com video.
Added a video showing a C-stand with moveable upper leg being set up on stairs.

Added a citation directly to the interview in which Ed Phillips, the late co-founder of Matthews Grip, verifies the origin of the name C-stand and Matthews involvement in popularizing the stand in film production.
Pointing out the tautology that the sentence describes - the visible light spectrum is called that because the human eye can perceive it.
Added a video showing a C-stand with moveable upper leg being set up on stairs.
Added the common US equivalent term for the UK term ‘focus puller’.

Reverted to revision 903692780 by [[Special:Contributions/Billinghurst|Billinghurst]] ([[User talk:Billinghurst|talk]]) ([[WP:TW|TW]])
/* Black Body */ Tone
/* See also */ Alphabetized list. Divided list into columns. Removed repeat links as per MOS:NOTSEEALSO.
Bluelinking 1 books for [[WP:V|verifiability]]. #IABot (v2.1alpha2)
Citation needed: fix/cleanup reason parameter (via [[WP:JWB]])
/* Outdoors and photography */ Image of old scrimmed film set
/* top */  warnings should be used when article content is unreliable. This one does not seem to be dodgy and there are at least some references.
Updated stub tag
Improved equation formatting. It was ugly, now it is less ugly.
Small language changes
/* Psychological color balance */ typo fix
/* Wien's displacement law */
"thermal energy" changed to "internal energy", "thermal energy" simply does not exists in modern thermodynamic.
